answers.answer: I just got my weight taken blood pressure and what not. And then heard her heartbeat and got my tummy measured and that was it. It was just like my other appointments
I thought they check the babies position. When are you scheduled for your next ultrasound?
I have a whole list i have to do, it's says it on my paper work. I have to do my diabetes test again and some hiv test and some others . It's going to be long day!
Wait , Ithought the HIV test is done in the beginning of the pregnancy?
It says I have to do another one? I already have done it but idk.

It's the same as all your other appts. If they schedule another ultrasound it will be around 35 weeks but not all doctors do. Most only do if there is a concern. Your appts wing changed until 36 weeks when they start checking your cervix.
Thanks, that's helpful. So 36 is when they start checking the cervix. Thank you miss
You are welcome. Yes it is. I am 36 weeks tomorrow with boy #3.

question: What to expect at 30weeks appointment,  ladies fill me up please.
title: 30 weeks
